alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 29 at 4:40AM PDT until July 29 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High temperatures of 90 to 100 for the inland valleys expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...The heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.
